reg:regulation.reg:title: Property Transfer Tax Exemption Regulation No. 21

bcl:subsection.bcl:text: The transfers to 0995817 B.C. Ltd., Inc. No. BC0995817, of the properties described below on March 31, 2015 are exempt from tax payable under the Property Transfer Tax Act:
The transfer to 0995817 B.C. Ltd. of the property described below on March 31, 2015 is exempt from tax payable under the Property Transfer Tax Act:

bcl:paragraph.bcl:text: Block A, District Lot 7384, Cassiar District, PID 029-535-166.

bcl:section.bcl:text: This regulation is retroactive to March 30, 2015, with effect on and after that date.

reg:content.reg:provisionsnote: [Provisions relevant to the enactment of this regulation: Property Transfer Tax Act, R.S.B.C. 1996, c. 378, section 37 (2) (b) and (3)]
